- CSR Object YAML file:
```yaml
apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1
kind: CertificateSigningRequest
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2024-09-28T19:06:02Z"
  name: agent-smith
  resourceVersion: "1724"
  uid: 30938847-0fbd-4b38-a674-8fd5d657027b
spec:
  groups:
  - system:masters
  - system:authenticated
  request: 
  signerName: kubernetes.io/kube-apiserver-client
  usages:
  - digital signature
  - key encipherment
  - server auth
  username: agent-x
status: {}
```

**Note:** the CSR is **base64** encoded

- To approve the CSR we use the following command:
```bash
kubectl certificate approve {csr-name}
```
